Question: The United States Air Force named a C-17 Globemaster III transport aircraft the Spirit of this person.
Hints: In the early days, this person's career included appearances on stage in Vaudeville shows and Broadway productions.
In 1934, this person married Dolores (DeFina) Reade, who had been one of his co-stars on Broadway in Roberta.
Two years later, he was present at the opening of the ____ Gallery of American Entertainment at the Library of Congress.
